getMessage

java.lang.String getMessage(TextLocalizable label,
                            Culture culture)
Returns the localized text for a given localResource. If parameter asMnemonic is false the mnemonic indicators are removed prior of returning the result.

Parameters:
label - the resource label
culture - the Culture to use in the label localization.
Returns:
the localizaed message for the label in the given Culture.
